meanings.sent1: He was biffing the punching bag at the gym.
meanings.sent2: She biffed the bully who was bothering her.
meanings.sent3: The siblings were playfully biffing each other in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The boxer was biffing his opponent with powerful punches.
meanings.sent5: The sound of biffing echoed through the room during the fight.

meanings.sent1: The biffing from the fight left a bruise on his arm.
meanings.sent2: He felt the biffing on his face after the altercation.
meanings.sent3: The comic book hero delivered a mighty biffing to the villain.
meanings.sent4: The biffing in the movie scene looked so realistic.
meanings.sent5: The loud biffing sound startled everyone in the room.

meanings.definition: Engaging in physical combat or fighting.
meanings.sent1: The two wrestlers were biffing in the ring for the championship.
meanings.sent2: The street gangs were biffing over territory.
meanings.sent3: The kids were biffing over who gets the last cookie.
meanings.sent4: The warriors were biffing fiercely in the battle.
meanings.sent5: The soldiers were biffing bravely against the enemy forces.
